languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс и Маражай в последний раз обмениваются взглядами — ненавидящим людским и презрительным друкарским — и молча следуют за вами.{/n}
{n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс и Маражай в последний раз обмениваются взглядами — ненавидящим людским и презрительным друкарским — и молча следуют за вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai shoot the last looks, a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari one, and silently follow.{/n}
{n}Heinrix and Marazhai shoot the last looks, a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari one, and silently follow.{/n}
{n}Heinrix and Marazhai shoot the final looks, a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari one, and silently follow.{/n}
{n}Heinrix and Marazhai shoot the final looks, a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari one, and silently follow.{/n}
{n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}
{n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix et Marazhai échangent un dernier regard, celui de l'humain chargé de haine, celui du Drukhari transpirant de dédain. Ils vous emboîtent le pas sans mot dire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix et Marazhai échangent un dernier regard, celui de l'humain chargé de haine, celui du Drukhari transpirant de dédain. Ils vous emboîtent le pas sans un mot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希与玛拉斋互相瞪了对方一眼，前者的目光充满恨意，后者的目光满怀轻蔑。随后，两个人默默地跟了上来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希与玛拉斋互相瞪了对方一眼，前者的目光充满恨意，后者的目光满怀轻蔑。随后，两个人默默地跟了上来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスとマラズハイは、人間の憎しみがこもった目と、デュカーリの軽蔑がこもった目を互いに最後に向け合ったあと、黙ってついてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスとマラズハイは、人間の憎しみがこもった目と、デュカーリの軽蔑がこもった目を互いに最後に向け合ったあと、黙ってついてきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix und Marazhai sehen sich ein letztes Mal an ... der Mensch hasserfüllt und der Drukhari verächtlich, und folgen schweigend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix und Marazhai blicken sich ein letztes Mal an, der Mensch hasserfüllt und der Drukhari verächtlich, und folgen schweigend.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix y Marazhai se miran una última vez, el odio del humano contra el desdén del Drukhari, y te siguen en silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix y Marazhai intercambian una última mirada, el odio del humano contra el desdén del Drukhari, y te siguen en silencio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ve Marazhai, birbirlerine son bir bakış atıyor. Heinrix gözlerini dikip nefret dolu bakarken, Marazhai ise bakışlarıyla kibirli kibirli dalga geçiyor. Ardından da gık çıkarmadan peşinden geliyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix and Marazhai give each other one last look — a hateful human glare and a disdainful Drukhari sneer — and silently follow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ve Marazhai, birbirlerine son bir bakış atıyor. Heinrix gözlerini dikip nefret dolu bakarken, Marazhai ise bakışlarıyla kibirli kibirli dalga geçiyor. Ardından da gık çıkarmadan peşinden geliyorlar.{/n}
